General.Name: Saimo Electric Co Ltd
General.Description: Saimo Technology Co., Ltd. provides intelligent detection products and control systems in China. The company's Bulk Handling division offers weighing products, including high precision belt scales, floating scale belt scales, coal weighing feeders, weighing feeders, batching systems, checking equipment, weighing instruments/load cells, and other measuring equipment; bulk material detection products, such as sweep sampling, auger sampling, sample preparation and analytics, and coal sample transportation systems; and conveyor protection products comprising run off, safety pull, position, tilt, and under speed switches, as well as belt damaged detectors and motion monitor systems. Its Packaging division provides flexible and bulk packaging lines; weighing and filling products, such as multihead and linear weighers, auger fillers, and volumetric cup fillers; open mouth, valve bag, bulk bag, and premade bag packers, as well as vertical form fill seals, bulk bag dischargers, and vacuum loaders; checkweigher and metal detector inspection products; robotic, low level, and high level palletizers; and inclined, screw, take off, bet, and chain conveyors, as well as turn tables and bucket elevators. The company also provides spare parts and manuals, and field and training services; and industrial handling robots and quantitative packaging machinery. In addition, it offers pillow bag, tray, carton, bottle, open mouth bag, and bulk bag solutions for the dry and processed food, fresh food, frozen food, liquid and thick, and nonfood industries; and bulk handling solutions for the power, chemical, cement, steel, metallurgy, port, coal, and quarry industries. The company was formerly known as Saimo Electric Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Saimo Technology Co., Ltd. in May 2020. Saimo Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Xuzhou, China.
